issue.title: [Python] Remove references to timestamps_to_ms argument from documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
timestamps_to_ms is documented in https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/pandas.html but does not exist in https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.Table.html

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2689?focusedCommentId=16508734) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
